author: Marko Cekić
comment: for some reason it isnt showing in my android wear app or on my watch (moto 360 1st gen) if u fix i give 5star cos these watchfaces look realy cool

author: Joe
comment: The weather still rarely displays correctly for my location, but besides that its my main watch face.

author: J Vides
comment: Works great. Just a few slow downs during animations, other than that is great. A few more face designs won't hurt. Thanks guys!!!
title: Great faces!

author: Shamil Shah
comment: Great concept but no way to actually set the face Edit: figured out how to set the watch.  When downloading fresh, notification will appear on watch if you want to install. Otherwise, it cannot be found on Android Wear play store.

author: Harry Seeto
comment: Love changing the colors to match what I am wearing.
title: Awesome watch face!

author: horia petrila
comment: Weather is not updating and doesn't show the correct temperature information. Good app, but needs to be fixed.
title: Ok but fix weather

author: Michael Christopher
comment: Works great! Easy to customize. Better than any app the smart watches come with.

author: jesse tellier
comment: Love the ability to pick colors from a picture
title: Awesome

author: Christopher DeMichiei
comment: Great watch, but the weather never updates properly.

author: Brendan Kenny
comment: Watch does not show up in android wear or the watch

author: Katherine Mosley
comment: Dress watch face,  Nice little space <3

author: Hendra Ahai
comment: Good
title: Hen

author: Ashraf Hussain
comment: Awesome......

author: Ray Espinosa
comment: I didn`t know how to view the watchface on my Moto 360 (1gen). I see no "send to watch" button or something like that, if it is supposed to be automatically it fails with me. The app looks great but I can`t make it work, I wish developer could help me.

author: Patrick Mihaila
comment: It became my daily face as it defines what a smartwatch should be, personalised and creative, something that an Apple Watch wearer would love to have, something unique. Though it would be an amazing idea to add more faces, even when we would be put to pay for them it would still be a nr. one priority on the next list of updates.
title: Amazing app

author: Brooks Straub
comment: Does just what it is supposed to do! Would love more faces for it though!
title: Great App

author: Gaurav Shah
comment: Front camera upside down
title: Problem of nexus 5x

author: Ricky Rosander
comment: Very diverse and customizable. Would I'd even pay to have more watch faces and more than 2 colors
title: Very good

author: Lalit Verma
comment: Excellent application. The watch face compliments the dress colors to the exact shades.

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: The weather is stuck in 53 degrees F. The watch also needs a full color ambient mode support. The faces are cute but please fix.

author: Dbizardi Bizardi
comment: Very good app. If had more choices I would rate a 5 stars.
title: Please add more face choices

author: Vincent Ma
comment: As the title states, this is definitely one of the best watch faces I've used so far. Very customizable and nice styling. Only complaint is that I really want to take advantage of the weather display, but it never seems to update. In the past 4 months it has only ever shown 33 and 39F as the temperature, so it's safe to assume it is not updating properly.
title: One of the best watch faces, but weather doesn't update

author: Dirk Engstrom
comment: This does exactly what it says. Installed on Moto 360 2nd Gen. The ability to just take a picture of what you want the colors to look like is a great idea, I'm tired of endlessly tweaking colors in other faces. Great assortment of designs to choose from. Would have paid for this.
title: I've paid for worse faces

author: Oliver Valente
comment: Sometimes the app shuts down and defaults to the watch you didn't choose. That's annoying. I think that's an Android problem tho
title: Simple looks great

author: Enoch Ko
comment: Weather function wasn't working. Thought it was a feature I was supposed to purchase under a the disguise of a "donation". Made a "donation" but I still don't have the weather function.
title: Mislead?

author: Mohammed BaAli
comment: I give it 4 star in account of square watchface missing
title: Amazing idea

author: Austin Anderson
comment: Love the ability to match to different outfits and colors. Nice customization options too (time, date, weather, multiple faces).
title: Great idea

author: Jose J Rosa
comment: Nice app and great idea. I like to see more watch designs to choose from and more than 2 colors to put on the watch. But other than that it's a great app.
title: Nice app

author: Matt Case
comment: It's beautiful, quick, and responsive
title: Amazing

author: Mal Warwick
comment: ...each time I tried to open settings from my Moto 360 (2nd gen) the app stopped working. Uninstalled and reinstalled, but still not able to access settings. The black and white face seems to work but I do like a bit of colour, so will have to uninstall and hope it will be fixed soon.
title: Liked the look of this, but...

author: ShashTrip
comment: Question, I used the first watch face, but all I saw on my watch was --°F even with an Internet connection. Maybe I am doing something wrong? In that case, I will change it to 5 stars because I really do like this face.
title: Weather won't show

author: Leslie Torraville
comment: It's great for the fashion conscience. Matches your watch face to your clothes or makeup choices. Very easy to use. Just take a pic and pick the colours you want to use. It doesn't get any easier.
title: Perfect

author: eddie pearson
comment: I have the Asus Zenwatch 2 and the watch face crashes when I try to access the settings from the watch. The phone app works perfectly.
title: Can't access watch settings from watch

author: Alihaider Mahmood
comment: I can't get this connected to a MOTO360. I'm not seeing it on the watch or any options in the app to switch my watch face to dress watch.
title: Compatibility Issues

author: Nito Lugo
comment: Works well, though I wish the color recognition worked better and that there were more options. Looking forward to any updates!

author: Blake Mitchell
comment: This app would be awesome if the weather worked.

author: Rodd Clarkson
comment: Love that it's got date and weather too.
title: Nice work.

author: Ahmad Aink
comment: Usefull for my watch
title: Great apps

author: daniel carrillo
comment: It has utilize every aspect that makes android wear a great platform, from the choices to the ability of having now different watchfaces, it's incredible, still a little cartoonish but o know with time the Polish will come more and more the day that comes I will be willing to pay even a monthly fee truly a great app one of not the best watchfaces out there
title: This app it'd amazing!

author: Bryan Castleberry
comment: 5 stars if you would make the temp more configurable. I've downloaded openweathermaps and added my city but it's said 86° for 2 days
title: Broken weather
